1830273c-a9bd-4139-a67a-bd73450a6d4f.description: Earners of the Cyara Certified Expert (Platform Essentials) certification have successfully demonstrated they can maximize the capabilities of the Cyara Automated CX Assurance Platform for common use cases, including how to create, validate, tune and manage Cyara Test Cases, adhering to best practices. They also know how to use these test cases to execute Cyara campaigns for basic functional tests and how to analyze the results from Cyara reports.
1830273c-a9bd-4139-a67a-bd73450a6d4f.name: Cyara Certified Expert (Platform Essentials)

badge_template_activities.title: Successfully completed Cyara Platform Essentials Training
Successfully completed Cyara Platform Essentials Certification Assessment

de838f01-1d01-4068-ba50-8a3620320a9a.description: Earners of the Cyara Certified Expert (IVR Application Testing) certification have developed the skills required to perform Functional and Regression testing of voice IVR applications. They are proficient in creating, validating, tuning and managing Cyara Test Cases adhering to recommended best practices. They can generate Test Case Regression Suites for existing and pre-production environments, including executing campaigns and analyzing reports.
de838f01-1d01-4068-ba50-8a3620320a9a.name: Cyara Certified Expert (IVR Application Testing)

badge_template_activities.title: Cyara Certified Expert (Platform Essentials)
Successfully completed Cyara IVR Application Testing Training
Successfully completed Cyara IVR Application Testing Certification Assessment

ff234798-8d07-4723-accf-af9e259b6eeb.description: Earners of the Cyara Certified Expert (CX Monitoring) certification have developed the skills required to perform contact center monitoring for their organization. They can create and execute a monitoring suite of test cases for business critical call flows and setup alerts to be generated on failure of any test. They can create and customize the Cyara Pulse reporting Dashboard and analyze all reporting results.
ff234798-8d07-4723-accf-af9e259b6eeb.name: Cyara Certified Expert (CX Monitoring)

badge_template_activities.title: Cyara Certified Expert (Platform Essentials)
Successfully completed Cyara CX Monitoring Training
Successfully completed Cyara CX Monitoring Certification Assessment

42b5dc58-9840-4b7c-8432-a6c2c6f35616.description: Earners of the Cyara Certified Expert (IVR Performance Testing) certification have developed the skills required to execute performance (load) testing within the contact center environment. They are proficient in creating strategies to test a contact center platform and then create/execute these test strategies using the Cyara platform. They are able to analyze all results in relation to acceptance criteria assigned to performance tests.
42b5dc58-9840-4b7c-8432-a6c2c6f35616.name: Cyara Certified Expert (IVR Performance Testing)

badge_template_activities.title: Cyara Certified Expert (Platform Essentials)
Successfully completed Cyara IVR Performance Testing Training
Successfully completed Cyara IVR Performance Testing Certification Assessment

28f526ec-fea2-4d0a-996e-dd52ed3bf478.description: Earners of the Cyara Certified Expert (Outbound Testing) certification have developed the skills required to perform Outbound Testing within the contact center environment. They are proficient in setting up all Cyara outbound test case scenarios. They can also create and execute outbound voice campaigns to interact with contact center dialer platforms, as well as being able to analyse Outbound reports from the Cyara platform.
28f526ec-fea2-4d0a-996e-dd52ed3bf478.name: Cyara Certified Expert (Outbound Testing)

badge_template_activities.title: Cyara Certified Expert (Platform Essentials)
Successfully completed Cyara Outbound Testing Training
Successfully completed Cyara Outbound Testing Certification Assessment

04000b2f-d54a-427c-b51f-0de82235ada9.description: Earners of the Cyara Certified Expert (Virtual Agent Testing) certification have developed the skills required to perform Agent Experience (Virtual) testing within the contact center environment. They are proficient in setting up a virtual agent environment within Cyara that can communicate with a vendor contact center platform. They can also emulate agent behaviors when an interaction is received from a customer, including verification of customer data, as well as being able to analyse reports.
04000b2f-d54a-427c-b51f-0de82235ada9.name: Cyara Certified Expert (Virtual Agent Testing)

badge_template_activities.title: Cyara Certified Expert (Platform Essentials)

7030aa4d-7a1c-4c50-a2c2-8dd8bbbf2f79.description: Earners of the Cyara Certified Guru (Digital Channels) certification, specific to Cyara partner technical resources, have developed the skills required to perform Digital Channels testing within a contact center environment using the Cyara Platform. They can also configure an emulated agent to test and analyze the full CX-AX experience using Cyara.

fbfd4dae-3cfd-4af9-b355-a2a2009fdd09.description: Earners of the Cyara Certified Guru (Platform Deployments) certification have demonstrated via a practical exam, the skills required to build a fully functional Cyara Platform. They are proficient in executing database scripts, software installation, configuration and troubleshooting. The earner of this badge also used the skillsets obtained in other Cyara courses to create Cyara test cases, execute Cyara campaigns and analyzed Cyara reports in order to showcase a fully working platform.
fbfd4dae-3cfd-4af9-b355-a2a2009fdd09.name: Cyara Certified Guru (Platform Deployments)
